overview:
Bharat Saini is co-founder and Chief Technology Officer of eMerge Health Solutions. In his current role Mr. Saini has been instrumental in designing and overseeing development of technology solutions for surgery center automation. Mr. Saini has developed partnerships with global vendors and provided leadership in research and development of solutions that are currently pending patents.

Prior to eMerge, Mr. Saini worked at GE Aviation for a number of years in several roles of increasing responsibility in supply chain and engineering IT organizations. Most recently Mr. Saini was Program Manager in the Engineering Tools CoE and led initiatives for the deployment of new technologies for engine test data management which replaced systems and processes that have been in use since the 1960s. Prior to GE, Mr. Saini was a senior consultant at Cap Gemini Ernst & Young where he consulted with fortune 50 companies on technology strategy.
